content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of three stone furnaces in a row:
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0)  
- Furnace 3 at position (4.0, 4.0)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line
Located around position (9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Input wooden chest at position (6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at position (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at position (12.5, 11.5) storing completed circuits

### Power Generation System
Located around position (-7.0, 24.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler:
  - Pipes at (-9.5, 23.5), (-8.5, 23.5), (-8.5, 22.5), (-7.5, 22.5)
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 24.5) generating steam
- Steam pipe at position (-5.5, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles around positions (4.5, 8.5), (6.5, 1.5), (4.5, 16.5), etc.

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied positions
- Check if target position is already occupied before placing new entities
- Remove existing entities if you need to place something in their position
- This occurred when trying to place a lab at position (0.5, 28.5)

### Errors with entity retrieval
- Ensure the entity exists at the target position before trying to get it
- Verify the correct prototype and position when using get_entity()
- This occurred when trying to get lab at position (0.5, 28.5)

### Errors with item insertion
- Check inventory has sufficient items before attempting to insert them
- This occurred when trying to insert coal into boiler with empty coal inventory
